Package de.dedede.model.persistence.util

Class MaintenanceProcess

java.lang.Object
de.dedede.model.persistence.util.MaintenanceProcess
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public final class MaintenanceProcess extends Object implements Runnable
Implements a runnable maintenance process as a singleton. When run by a thread, the maintenance process will check for inconsistent data entries in the application's data store with a given frequency.

  • Method Details

    • setTimeoutInterval

      public static void setTimeoutInterval​(int interval)
      Sets the frequency, with which a maintenance process instance queries the data store. Takes immediate effect.
      Parameters:
      interval - The new time interval between checks.

    • getInstance

      public MaintenanceProcess getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of the MaintenanceProcess.
      Returns:
      The singleton MaintenanceProcess instance

    • run

      public void run()
      Executes the maintenance process between set intervals. This method will cause the calling thread to sleep and is therefore intended to be executed by a stand-alone worker thread.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Instructs the thread to execute any urgent tasks and shut down in a graceful manner. After calling this method once, it has no effect.
